document.title: &dactyl.appName; Printing

description.p: Print current document. Open a GUI dialog where you can select the printer, number of copies, orientation, etc. When used with !, the dialog is skipped and the default printer used.
As above, but write the output to filename.

document.p: The "Print Preview" and "Page Setup" dialogs can be opened via the :dialog command
